long-description.p:
Educate Together is the representative organisation of the Educate Together schools and associations throughout the Republic of Ireland. It owes its origins to the movement to establish new multi-denominational primary schools, which emerged in the late 1970s and early 1980s. By 1984, when Educate Together was established, there were three schools and the organisation acted as their co-ordinating body. Since then the movement has grown considerably.
Today there are 56 schools, 26 of which are in the greater Dublin area. The organisation became a company limited by guarantee in 1998 and has charitable status. It has a small national office which provides representative and support services to existing schools and Start Up groups. The Directors and members of the company work in a voluntary capacity.
To find the cache you will need to answer a few simple questions the answers to which can be found on the boards at the above location
How many schools took part in the painting Call the answer A
How many childern are on the paintings Call the answer B
How many building blocks are there Call the answer C
Add the numbers on the building blocks Call the answer D
The cache can be found at N 53째 35.BC W 006째 09(A-D)(B-A)(C+D-A)

The Cache is a small container.
Please take care and rehide the cache to prevent muggles from discovering its location.

ul.li:
2010-06-13T19:00:00Z : Didn't find it by Blue Jay 59
Like the last chacher - we had no luck - solved the puzzle and found hollow tree - bang on the co-ords but no cache. Will email details to CO in case it's muggled. TFTC anyhow.

2010-05-30T19:00:00Z : Didn't find it by thomasvm
Solved the clue - and searched at least four holow trees - but could not find it. A lot of muggles around, so it will have to wait until the next visit.

2010-05-11T19:00:00Z : Found it by medic143
one of 3 done after a small job in Balbriggan. DId the maths correctly. My GPS lead me to a likely prospect (BTW I cache in shorts and this is NOT shorts friendly), turned out to be the wrong spot but the GPS then suggested a second spot. Cache is well hidden
TNLN TFTC

2010-04-24T19:00:00Z : Found it by Donnacha
Found after attending the CITO. Thanks.

2010-03-21T19:00:00Z : Found it by merann
Lovely spot with muggles galore in Ardgillan today as it was a beautiful day. The cache was an easy enough find after we had gathered up all the info required. TNLNSL. TFTC, Merann.

groundspeak:cache.groundspeak:name: Ardgillan IV "Murals"
groundspeak:cache.groundspeak:long_description:
Educate Together is the representative organisation of the Educate Together schools and associations throughout the Republic of Ireland. It owes its origins to the movement to establish new multi-denominational primary schools, which emerged in the late 1970s and early 1980s. By 1984, when Educate Together was established, there were three schools and the organisation acted as their co-ordinating body. Since then the movement has grown considerably.
Today there are 56 schools, 26 of which are in the greater Dublin area. The organisation became a company limited by guarantee in 1998 and has charitable status. It has a small national office which provides representative and support services to existing schools and Start Up groups. The Directors and members of the company work in a voluntary capacity.

The Cache

To find the cache you will need to answer a few simple questions the answers to which can be found on the boards at the above location

How many schools took part in the painting Call the answer A

How many childern are on the paintings Call the answer B

How many building blocks are there Call the answer C

Add the numbers on the building blocks Call the answer D

Final Location

The cache can be found at N 53째 35.BC W 006째 09(A-D)(B-A)(C+D-A)

The Cache is a small container.

Please take care and rehide the cache to prevent muggles from discovering its location.
